title: file: /root/svc/node/snapshots/v1-015000-015500-headers.seg, runtime error: slice bounds out of range
body:
erigon version:  58c8baf2efcd661aaef42180c55d4e724a1d3d81
I upgraded my node from v2.28.1 to  the latest devel branch 58c8baf2efcd661aaef42180c55d4e724a1d3d81
Rolled back to v2.28.1, the node is running normally

looks good
